description: This file contains all the error codes for while the retry logic would not be triggered

errorCodes.errorDescription: A resource deployment was disallowed by policy
The subscription must be registered to use the namespace.
The policy contains new parameter(s) which are not present in the existing policy and have no default value. New parameters may be added to a policy only if they have a default value.
The policy assignment has the parameter(s) which are not defined in the policy definition
Cannot proceed with operation because the resource is not in Succeeded state.
User is not authorized to create a particular resource/subscription
The request content was invalid and could not be deserialized
The policy assignment is missing the parameter(s) as defined in the policy definition.
